helpText: Å_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ö.

generic.title: Å_Error updating categories__________________________ö
generic.message: Å_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ö.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Å_Error updating categories__________________________ö
maxDepthExceeded.message: Å_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ö.

destinationHasSameName.title: Å_Error updating categories__________________________ö
destinationHasSameName.message: Å_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ö.

noSchema.title: Å_Schema not found_________________ö
noSchema.message: Å_Item schema not found for user_________________ö.

maxCharacter.title: Å_Error updating categories__________________________ö
maxCharacter.message: Å_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ö.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Å_Delete category________________ö
deleteInUseCategory.message: Å_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ö.

custom.title: Å_Custom categories__________________ö
custom.message: Å_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ö.

arcgis.title: Å_ArcGIS categories__________________ö
arcgis.message: Å_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ö.

iso.title: Å_ISO categories_______________ö
iso.message: Å_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ö.

inspire.title: Å_INSPIRE categories___________________ö
inspire.message: Å_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ö.
